title: New: Pale Waves – There’s A Honey
content:
Manchester outfit Pale Waves are no stranger to these pages, however after a flurry of activity eighteen months ago, the four piece took a step back, with all recorded material disappearing and live appearances being decidedly limited.

Now officially signed to Dirty Hit, and with their debut single official (produced by The 1975’s Matt Healy and George Daniel) out in the world, they’re ready to take 2017 by storm. One of the most ambitious first offerings of the year thus far, it’s hook-laden 80’s indebted pop at it’s very best – whilst managing to sound undeniably fresh and exciting. Check out There’s A Honey below.

Pale Waves tour the UK with Superfood and King Nun in March and April, dates after the jump.
